Engine Rental Request Confirmation
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
We’re glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We’ve received your {!Case.Subject} inquiry and we’re ready to get started. Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Our office hours are Monday - Friday, from 12am - 4pm (Phoenix, AZ time)
Is your aircraft AOG?
All routine or non-Aircraft on Ground (AOG) inquiries outside our office hours will be processed the next business day.
For AOGs outside office hours, please contact the AOG desk at AOG@Honeywell.com or 800-601-3099, option 4, and provide the following information:
>> Purchase order
>> Rental worksheet
>> Next scheduled flight
Click here for Engine Rental information including policy, pricing, forms for loaner transactions.
Questions
We’ll connect all of your request details through the subject line of this email. So, should you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Engine Rental Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
